mapper.select: SELECT DATE_FORMAT(create_time, '%y-%m') AS bindPBMTime, count(DISTINCT device_id) AS bindPBMCount FROM device_location_info WHERE device_type = 'blood_pressure_meter' GROUP BY bindPBMTime HAVING bindPBMTime > DATE_FORMAT( DATE_ADD(NOW(), INTERVAL - #{months,jdbcType=INTEGER} MONTH), '%y-%m' ) AND bindPBMTime <= DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%y-%m') ORDER BY bindPBMTime DESC

SELECT DATE_FORMAT(create_time, '%m-%d') AS bindPBMTime, count(DISTINCT device_id) AS bindPBMCount FROM device_location_info WHERE device_type = 'blood_pressure_meter' GROUP BY bindPBMTime HAVING bindPBMTime > DATE_FORMAT( DATE_ADD(NOW(), INTERVAL - #{days,jdbcType=INTEGER} DAY), '%m-%d' ) AND bindPBMTime <= DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%m-%d') ORDER BY bindPBMTime DESC
SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT device_id) AS number FROM device_location_info WHERE device_type = 'blood_pressure_meter'
SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT device_id) AS number FROM device_location_info WHERE DATE_FORMAT(create_time, '%y-%m-%d') = DATE_FORMAT(now(), '%y-%m-%d') AND device_type = 'blood_pressure_meter'
